13.content:
"So Ino, I haven't seen you around often," commented Sakura as she and the Yamanka heiress sat at a table within a dango stand, happily chewing away at the treats they had purchased.

"Sorry," apologized Ino as she pulled one of the dango balls off of the stick before putting the whole thing in her mouth. "Among a few things here and there I've been trying to master the Mind Body Disturbance Technique."

"Isn't that one of your clan's hardest jutsus?" asked Sakura,

"Of course, to be able to control a persons body while still remaining in control of your own body is incredibly strenuous," explained Ino. "I didn't want to just rely on my Mind Body Switch Technique because of how much of a precarious situation it leaves my own body in."

"Wow so how close are you to completing it?" asked Sakura before realizing that her body had frozen in place. Blinking a couple of times she noticed that Ino's hands were in one of her families patented seals.

"I'm about this close," said Ino.

"Wow, this is amazing, I can't so much as move a muscle," said Sakura doing her best to fight against the control of the Yamanaka. "Alright Ino, you can let me go now."

"Hmm, no," said Ino as she stood up from the table but not before popping the last dango ball in her mouth. Likewise, Sakura rose from the table but not by her own power. The two of them quickly left the establishment before jumping on top of one of the nearby buildings roof.

"Ino, what are you doing with my body?" asked Sakura as she doubled her attempts to break out of the Yamanaka's control.

"Just a mission," said Ino casually as the two of them began to bound across the rooftops, the blonde having no trouble in controlling the pink haired girl.

"Surely this isn't a mission from Tsunade-sama, she would never want you to do something like this," declared Sakura.

"Who said that this mission was ordered by the Hokage?" asked Ino starting to make Sakura worried as they made it to the edge of the village before continuing further into the forest. Miles flew by before the two of them stopped at a small cabin.

"Why'd you bring me here?" asked Sakura as her body walked up to the front door and knocked on the wooden object. Seconds ticked by before the door opened up to reveal Hinata standing there. "Hinata?"

"Oh, so glad you could make it Sakura," said Hinata as she moved out of the way to allow Ino and Sakura to enter, locking the door behind them. Now that Ino had delivered Sakura, she...
13.title: Ino has a role in this?

134.content:
"Sakura, look at what you've done," stated Ino.

"Oh my, what a mess," said Hinata as she looked at the wet patch that stained Sakura's clothing.

"Ohmygod, that wasn't me," said Sakura as she flailed her arms around wildly.

"Really? Who else could it have been then?" asked Hinata.

Sakura paused a minute before her eyes locked on Ino. "You did this to me!" she declared aggressively.

"How? As you can see you have free reign over your body again, I stopped controlling you when we got in here," explained Ino. This was a lie in a certain sense as Ino's skill with her jutsu allowed her to control indivdual body parts, including the bladder but Sakura didn't need to know that. "Meaning that your mess there is all you."

Sakura merely blinked as she did her best to hide the stain with her hands, a blush spreading across her face from embarrassment. Had she really peed herself in front of her friends?

14411121.content: "What?!" Ino cried in fury. "I am your mother, now." Hinata said. "I will decide when to change your diapers. Do you understand, little baby?" And with a sweet, but obviously malicious grin Hinata turned and left the room. "That evil lavender-haired bitch!" Ino yelled angrily. "What the hell has gotten into her?! She was never like this before! She used to be a quiet, shy and very kind girl! And now... How could she do this to us?!" "I know." Sakura said. "Like you said before, we've got to get out of here." "Like that's even going to be possible." Ino grumbled. "Not only do we not know the layout of this enormous place at all, but we're the size of a baby. How are we even supposed to move fast enough to get away if she catches us trying and chases after us. We could be moving as fast as we physically can and she could catch up and capture us again just by walking. You're going to have to use your brain to figure this out, Sakura." "Unfortunately, I don't even know if my keen intellect is going to be enough to figure this out." Sakura said sadly. "Oh no!" "What is it?" Ino asked, though she thought she already knew what was wrong. "I've got to go, bad!" Sakura exclaimed. "Can't you try to hold it?" Ino asked. "No, for some reason it's impossible." Sakura said. "I can't hold it!" Sakura's eyes welled with tears of shame as she began to fill her diaper. The smell was awful. "Now I know how you feel, right now, Ino." Sakura said, sobbing. "Hinata is going to pay for this!" Just then...

info.brief_description: Hinata traps Sakura which makes her lose control of her bowels and her future!
info.description:
Hinata Hyuuga has a devilish plan to kidnap Sakura or trap her in her labratory. She wants wittle Sakura to be her friend forever and to give into her every demand. Hinata's plans are flawless and they all lead to one thing: diaper humiliation.

I have been noticing a few big problems with additions to this interactive...

First off, we shouldn't need to ever end the interactive...

Second, please actually think out your additions, one line additions are unacceptable and will be deleted. Put a few sentences in.

If you don't follow these guidelines, I apologize but I will have to remove your chapter.
